movie.title: Kill the Messenger
movie.plot: A reporter becomes the target of a vicious smear campaign that drives him to the point of suicide after he exposes the CIA's role in arming Contra rebels in Nicaragua and importing cocaine into California. Based on the true story of journalist Gary Webb.

events.title: the first of the Dark Alliance series of articles is published
